1: @@//gidben gnas su legs par bsgyur cing dag par byas pa'o// sngon gyi sgra bsgyur chen pe de dag gis//rgyud 'di bsgyur cid kun la grags lags mod//'on kyang sgra don
2: rgtsug lag ji bzhin du// rgyud 'di blo brtan gnyis pas legs par bsgyur//zab cing rgya che rdo rje thog pa yi//rnes don ye shes don gnyer skyes bu dag /chos dang don la legs par mi rton par//
3: gang zag tshig 'bru'i rjes su ma 'brang zhig//@@//rgya gar skan du/se ko +ge sha/bodskad du/dbang mdor bstan pa / dpal rdorje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //zla ba
4: bzang pos gsol pa/ / ston pa dbang bskyur rnam bdun dang//rnam gsum de bzhin bla na med//jig rten 'das pa'i dngos grub phyir//mdor bsdus pa yis bdag la gsungs//
5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' tsal pa//nyon cig zla bzang dbang bskur do'// rnam pa bdun dang rnam gsum mchog / rtsa yi kun spyod rtsol pa ni//mdor bstan pa yis khyod la bshad // rgyud du
6: mdor bstan rnam gsum dang//rgyas par bshad pa rnam gsum 'gyur// rab tu mngor bstan mdor bstan che//rab tu rgyas par bshad ba gzhan//mdor bstan rgyas par bshad pa nyi//
7: gsyud yang dag par bsdus par b'rjod // rab tu mdor bstan rgyas bshad pa//bka' 'grel tshig ni 'byed pa'o//mdor ba stan chen po rgyas bshad pa//'grel bshad thams cad don ston
8: byed//de ni mngon shes tho b rnams kyis//bya yi mkhas rnams kyis min nyid// de ltar mtha' drug rnams kyis dag/rdo rje'i rnal 'byor rnam bzhi dang//rdzogs pa'i byang chub bzhi rnams
